Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: AMI KUMORDZIE
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv when my laptop screen died and I needed an external monitor to extend the life of my pc. Instead of buying a computer screen, for the same price I got dual use out of this tv/computer monitor combo!! It was great having to option to either project from my computer using the hdmi or just watching tv. The picture is very crisp and bright and the sound was great too. I highly recommend this brand and this size is great for small offices or college dorms too!!

Reviews.Title: Dynex 15" LCD TV WoW!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Live InFull
Reviews.Content: This TV met all of my expectations. One of the best small LCD TV I needed to combine for TV and PC use. Image was very wow crystal clear. So far I cannot find any negative feedback about this TV. Great value for money.

Reviews.Title: Bought this for my mom..
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Bryant "Jennifer Williams"
Reviews.Content: Her screen on her computer went out, and the speakers that she had sucked, we bought this for her, and since receiving it and hooking it up and using it, she has had no complaints! Awesome product and awesome price! Cheapest I found!

Reviews.Title: Don't buy Dynex
Reviews.Author: S. Bradley
Reviews.Content: We've owned a Dynex 32" LCD TV for 3 years and 1 month. It has begun turning itself off and on--basically power cycling. It will cost more to fix it than buy a new one. Note that Dynex is the house brand for Best Buy and that they do not stand behind their product. Basically, you need to view this as a short-lived disposable TV because that is how they are manufactured.
